rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Reception Area
rooms.description: A welcoming area that sets the tone for the Bohemian style with natural light from large windows.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious area blending kitchen and living room with integrated dining space. Emphasis on natural ventilation using cross-ventilation openings.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: A serene bedroom suite with a private balcony and skylight for natural light, designed in Bohemian style.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom area ensuring privacy with sufficient natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace with ample light and inspired by Bohemian decor, integrating indoor plants for a natural feel.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large entrance door aligning with Vastu for positive energy flow.

openings.name: Living Area Windows
openings.description: Multiple windows ensuring natural light and cross ventilation.

openings.name: Kitchen Windows
openings.description: Windows to bring in natural light and fresh air into the kitchen space.
